name: Hard Life (Loubaris)
description:
Hard Life is a survival 3D open world with an amazing gaming experience.
The music, the ambiance, and a new technology in scratch games, The shaders ! All of these makes you have the best ever user experience. Hope you enjoy !
( Please fav if you like it ) At 20 likes I add the multiplayer mode and improve the map with new regions !
------------------------ READ -------------------------------------w
There are 4 regions for the moment :
-Flatland
-Forest
-Rocky Place
-Labs

Special items : 
2 Crates spawn randomly at the start
Potions, only craftable when you unlock the lab.

Hard Life also add a console ( Never saw in other scratch game ! ) in the console you can see whatever you do, your position, the region where you are, the time, when you break a block, when you break a statue and in the future the players online.
Controls :
WASD to move.
Arrow/Mouse for view/aim.
Click to fire / Q for precision aim.
Z to sneak/crouch
E to interact
R to reload gun
M to open console

This took me approximatively 2 days.
I hope you will enjoy it !
